name: River City Ransom: Underground
blurb: An officially licensed, North American follow-up to one of the most beloved RPG beat'em ups of all time.

rewards.reward: No Reward

FREE SMILE AT MERV'S ===========================\r\nEveryone who supports the game at $5 or more will receive a digital desktop wallpaper pack, and their name engraved on the founder's wall on the project web site.

JUST THE GAME\r\n=========================== \r\nYou'll receive a digital copy of the game for Windows when it is released. Regardless of distribution vehicle on launch day, you will always have a DRM-free option.

BARF!\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive a digital copy of the game for Windows when it is released. Regardless of distribution vehicle on launch day, you will always have a DRM-free option. You'll also get everything from the FREE SMILE AT MERV'S reward tier.

DISASTERPEACE =========================== \r\nYou'll receive a digital copy of the game's soundtrack. You'll also receive the soundtrack as an in-game weapon--don't tell us you've never been hit with a compact disc before, it smarts! This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You'll also get everything in the BARF! reward tier.
LET'S PLAY!\r\n===========================\r\nIdentical to the BARF! rewards tier, except you get two copies of the game, one to play and one to give away.

IF I HAD FRIENDS\r\n===========================\r\nIdentical to the BARF! rewards tier, except you get four copies of the game, one to play and three to give away to your spontaneously teleported new friends!
COMIC TIMES\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive a digital comic book. You'll also gain access to our closed beta. Includes everything in the BARF! rewards tier.

WOOD STICK\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive everything in the DISASTERPEACE reward tier, along with the map, manual, and comic book digital rewards. You'll also have access to our private beta.

GRAND SLAM =========================== You'll receive an in-game double-barreled bat on every new start. The only thing more menacing than a bat, is two bats. This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You will also receive a digital copy of the game, a desktop wallpaper pack, and your name on the website founder's wall.

SIMON'S CURSE\r\n=========================== You'll receive an in-game, mystical-themed morning star on every new start. Now you can cause a plague o' all their houses. This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You will also receive a digital copy of the game, a desktop wallpaper pack, and your name on the website founder's wall.

LEAD PIPE\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive everything in the WOOD STICK reward tier, along with all digital weapon skins: a double-barreled bat, a mystical morning star, and a gold-plated garbage can.
DRAGON TWINS\r\n=========================== \r\nYou'll receive everything in the LEAD PIPE reward tier, along with unlocked Kunio and Riki variations for your Alex and Ryan characters.

CD CELLAR\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive a digital copy of the game's soundtrack. You'll also receive the soundtrack as an in-game weapon--don't tell us you've never been hit with a compact disc before, it smarts! This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You will also receive a digital copy of the game, a desktop wallpaper pack, and your name on the website founder's wall.

SCANDAL RAG\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive an exclusively designed, River City High School crest athletic tee! Your choice of English or Japanese titling and standard sizing. Includes everything in the CD CELLAR reward tier.

SUSHI ROLL =========================== You'll receive a full-color, 18\u2033 \u00d7 24\u2033 poster of the game cover. Your choice of US/Canada or Japanese cover art variants. Add $25 to your pledge if you want both posters. Includes everything in the SCANDAL RAG reward tier.

CRATE EXPECTATIONS ($150)
=========================== 
You'll receive a boxed version of the game that
includes a game box, printed manual, labelled cartridge replica, and a postcard signed by each team member, including Yoshihisa Kishimoto. The box will also include a code to download the Windows game, but you'll receive this by email too. You will also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward. Anyone who pledges $150 and above will receive this boxed edition.

CRATE EXPECTATIONS 2\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive a boxed version of the game that includes a game box, printed manual, labelled cartridge replica, and a postcard signed by Conatus Creative team members (does not include Yoshihisa Kishimoto). The box will also include a code to download the Windows digital game, but you'll receive this by email too. You will also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward.

SUSHI ROLL\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive a full-color, 18\u2033 \u00d7 24\u2033 poster of the game cover. Your choice of US/Canada or Japanese cover art variants. Includes everything in the SCANDAL RAG reward tier.

GENERIC NO MORE\r\n===========================\r\nWe'll put your first name in the game as one of the evil gang members! All name submissions subject to approval (and screen real estate). Includes everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

BIZARF!\r\n===========================\r\nWe'll put your phrase in the game as fighting dialogue! We reserve the right to reject any phrase concepts. You'll also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

ABOBO FOR MAYOR\r\n===========================\r\nWe'll name a River City road, park, or public building in your honor. We reserve the right to reject any name concepts. You'll also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

TAGGED\r\n===========================\r\nWork with the design team to get your unique message spray painted somewhere in River City! We reserve the right to reject any concepts. You will receive an in-game credit on a dedicated backer credits screen. Includes everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

ROXY\r\n===========================\r\nWe'll craft a River City non-playable citizen in your image! Warning: 8 bits put on 15 pounds. We reserve the right to reject any character concepts. You'll also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

OVERWORLDERS\r\n===========================\r\nBackers of this reward will collaborate together to help us design an area of River City Ransom: Underground's overworld. You'll participate in video conference design sessions where we'll work out the environment's look and feel, level design, obstacles, buildings, inhabitants, etc. We reserve the right to reject any concepts. Leave your mark on River City! You'll also receive everything in the CRATE EXPECTATIONS reward.

NUCLEAR SPY\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive an original, signed, and unique in-character sketch of you by Bannon Rudis, the game's lead artist. You'll also receive your choice of one of ABOBO FOR MAYOR, TAGGED, or BIZARF! reward tiers.

MEET THE BACKERS\r\n===========================\r\nWe'll put your likeness, first name, and fighting phrase into the game as a member of the illustrious gang, The Backers. We reserve the right to reject any concepts. You'll also receive an original signed sketch of your character and everything in the CRATE EXPECTATIONS reward.

SOUL PROPRIETOR\r\n===========================\r\nWork with the design team to create a unique River City store, including its sign, interior, available items, and shopkeeper! Warning: 8 bits put on 15 pounds. We reserve the right to reject any concepts. You'll also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

RUSH\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive an invite to our private launch party in Montreal, Canada (travel and accommodations not provided), attended by Conatus Creative North America. You'll hang out with the team, play the game, and enjoy great food and drinks. We'll invite some awesome Montreal game developers to join us. You'll also receive everything in the ROXY reward.

A DOUBLE DRAGON DINNER\r\n===========================\r\nYoshihisa Kishimoto has generously offered to provide dinner for two lucky people (one guest, on two separate occasions) in his home in Tokyo! While travel and accommodations are not included, you will be treated to a Japanese meal with the legend himself. In attendance will be Ryoma Machida, our executive producer, to act as your guide and translator. You'll also receive everything in the ROXY reward.

LIKE A BOSS\r\n===========================\r\nWe'll immortalize you and your unique interests and style by putting you into the game as a gang demi-boss! Warning: 8 bits put on 15 pounds. We reserve the right to reject any character concepts. You'll also receive everything in the SUSHI ROLL reward tier.

63\r\n===========================\r\nYou'll receive an in-game credit as Executive Producer, and receive the LIKE A BOSS, SOUL PROPRIETOR, and NUCLEAR SPY (with all three options) rewards. You'll also get an unpublished, unique key sequence to max out all stats.
